title: Ticket #3767: PeakResidentSetSize would be a useful attribute
description: Clearly the peak is being tracked since the ImageSize is updated with it when the job completes, but while it runs I can only see ResidentSetSize, which is often lower than the peak.
remarks:
2015-Sep-22 15:17:41 by gthain:
Let's first document what the user log prints out at the end -- is it peak? or last. Can we clarify in the user log what the usage statistics were: peak, median, etc.?
creator: pfc
